Subject: Heritrix 3.1.0-RC1 release now available
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=325624130

A new test release of Heritrix before our final 3.1.0 release is now
available. See the following Release Notes page on the project wiki for
full details:

https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix/Release+Notes+-+Heritrix+3.1.0-RC1

We encourage expert Heritrix users curious about the new version, or
willing to help with testing, to try this release candidate and share feedback.

Our focus over the next couple weeks will be further testing under
realistic crawl conditions, and bug fixing.

As always, problem reports, ideas, fix/feature contributions, and other
kinds of feedback are all welcome here on the list and on the project
wiki and JIRA issue tracker:

Heritrix Wiki:http://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix
Heritrix JIRA:http://webarchive.jira.com/browse/HER

Noa
